features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Landing page with quick actions to create bugs, tasks, stories and recent issues widget

features.name: Issue Creation Modal

features.name: Issues List & Filtering
features.description: Paginated issue list with filtering by status, priority, type, reporter, and search

features.name: Issue Detail View
features.description: Detailed view of individual issues with comments, attachments, activity timeline, and status updates

features.name: Jira Integration

features.name: Email Notifications

features.name: Bulk Status Updates
features.description: Bulk update status for multiple issues (SQA and Admin only)

features.name: User Profile & Preferences
features.description: User profile page with notification preferences and theme settings

features.name: Admin Settings
features.description: Admin page for managing user roles and system settings

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: User feedback system with toast notifications for success, error, and info messages

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Dark/light theme support with system preference detection

features.name: Navigation & Routing
features.description: Client-side routing with protected routes and navigation

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Error boundary component for graceful error handling

features.name: Database Management
features.description: LibSQL database utilities for user management, preferences, and activity logging

features.name: API Client
features.description: Frontend API client for communicating with backend services

features.name: Type Definitions
